item.title: Reel editor for meta Ads - Upwork
item.description:
I have a folder with a bunch of content. We are a exotic rental car company and are coming with a new track a super car service. We need meta ads creatives for the whole funnel. Static ads we have taken care of. Folder is here. Please send me some of past work or ideas you have for the funnel on what we can do. If you read this description please add code word Blue in your Response.

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/10IF4dQhxDoBnJXoIuS74upSr1DXCBTO3?usp=drive_link

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 20, 2024 18:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Copywriting, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Copywriting, Audio Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.

item.title: Video Content Producer, Editor, & Strategist - Upwork
item.description:
We need someone located in NY for this role.

We are launching an exciting new entrepreneur YouTube interview show and are looking for a talented videographer and content strategist to join our team. This role is perfect for someone who is young, hungry, and eager to make a mark in the world of digital content.

These will be in-person interviews that we are filming so we need someone who is willing to travel to the locations with our team. We are looking for someone in the Westchester, NY area to start since that is where we are located and most of the guests will be.

As the show grows, we'll travel to other states to film episodes.

Responsibilities:
Film high-quality in-person interviews with host and guests
Edit raw footage into engaging episodes
Develop creative storytelling techniques to enhance each episode
Collaborate on episode strategies and content planning
Manage the entire production process from pre-production to post-production
Stay updated on industry trends and incorporate new ideas into the show

Requirements:
Proven experience in videography and video editing
Strong storytelling and creative skills
Ability to strategize and plan content effectively
Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
Highly motivated and able to work independently
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with social media content creation
Familiarity with YouTube and podcasting platforms
A portfolio showcasing previous work
Passion for content creation is just as important to us as experience.

Budget: $2,000
Posted On: June 20, 2024 17:34 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Camera Operation, Cinematography, Video Production, YouTube Video, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing, Creative Direction
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Camera Operation, Cinematography, Video Production, YouTube Video, Video Editing & Production, Video Editing, Creative Direction
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
